title: All-Party Parliamentary Motor Group
purpose: To debate the policy priorities of the UK's automotive industry, motorsport industry and vehicle users, focusing on UK manufacturing and the role of road transport, including the environmental impact; and to promote dialogue between politicians, these industries, users and other stakeholders.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 2051.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Andrew Harries, Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders Ltd
contact_details.secretariat: Society of Motor Manufacturers and Traders, Motorsport Industry Association and RAC Foundation jointly act as the group's secretariat. https://www.smmt.co.uk and https://the-mia.com and https://www.racfoundation.org
